name: BoomDude
description:
BOOMDUDE is a hacked demolition bot on his way to work in this intense arcade style colour switcher. Boomdude is hurt if he isn't matching the right colour so always be ready to switch!

- HOW TO PLAY
Touch left and right to match the BLUE and PINK buildings. Touch the top of the screen to shield against anything GREEN!
Stay focused and get HUGE COMBOS!

- Original electronic chip soundtrack by SUPERDEV!!!
- Randomized bosses and patterns for replayability!
- 2 Game modes! ARCADE and ZEN MODE!
- Find game altering power-ups!
- Change up the colour palette at will!
- IAP and AD FREE

Smash through everything! Break free from the shackles of robotic oppression! Crush the corporation and Reach THE END!
